summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 1091, entitled "An Ordinance authorizing the City Council of the City of Seattle to revoke the license issued to any person for the sale of intoxicating or malt liquors in the City of Seattle, who shall suffer, permit or allow gambling games to be carried on, opened up, or conducted in or on the premises in which he is engaged in the sale of intoxicating or malt liquors, in the City of Seattle," approved May 18, 1889.
